# Video capture view



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The video capture view component is a wrapper for the video element that allows you to display a video stream.

## Properties

## Methods

### `getVideoElement() => Promise<HTMLVideoElement | undefined>`

Get the internal video element.

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<HTMLVideoElement | undefined>`




## Slots

| Slot            | Description                                        |
| --------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| `"not-playing"` | Passes an indicator when the video is not playing. |
| `"recording"`   | Passes an indicator when the video is recording.   |


----------------------------------------------
